definition.name: quantum-3j-symbol
definition.definition: The quantum Clebsch-Gordan coefficient for U_q(su(2)): C^j_{m1,m2,m3}(q) is the q-analog of the Wigner 3j symbol. For q=1, reduces to the standard SU(2) 3j symbol. Satisfies q-orthogonality: sum_{m1,m2} |C^j_{m1,m2,m3}(q)|^2 = delta / [2j+1]_q where [n]_q = (q^n - q^{-n})/(q - q^{-1}).
